Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Leprechaun = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local petLeprechaun
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local summonSound
function summonLeprechaun() if myTorso and myHumanoid then summonSound = Leprechaun:FindFirstChild("LetItBegin") if summonSound then summonSound:Play() end petLeprechaun = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(74900154 ):GetChildren()[1] if petLeprechaun then debris:AddItem(petLeprechaun, 60) -- Make sure that it will get deleted petLeprechaun:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(-3, 3), 0, math.random(-3, 3)))
local leprechaunAIScript = Tool.LeprechaunAIScript:Clone()
while leprechaunAIScript:FindFirstChild("Leprechaun") == nil do wait() end
leprechaunAIScript.Leprechaun.Value = petLeprechaun leprechaunAIScript.Parent = vCharacter
local target = Instance.new("ObjectValue") target.Name = "Target" target.Value = nil target.Parent = petLeprechaun
wait() leprechaunAIScript.Disabled = false
debris:AddItem(leprechaunAIScript, 60)
petLeprechaun.Parent = game.Workspace petLeprechaun:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(math.random(-3, 3), 0, math.random(-3, 3))) Leprechaun.Transparency = 1.0
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(60.0) Leprechaun.Transparency = 0.0 end))
if petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then petLeprechaun.Humanoid.Died:connect(function() debris:AddItem(petLeprechaun, 4) Leprechaun.Transparency = 0.0 wait(3.5) end) end end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if not petLeprechaun or not petLeprechaun.Parent then summonLeprechaun() end
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - myTorso.Position).unit
local hit = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(myTorso.Position, direction * 150), vCharacter) if hit then local enemyHumanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if enemyHumanoid then if petLeprechaun and petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Target") then petLeprechaun.Target.Value = enemyHumanoid end end end
wait(2.0)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
function onUnequipped() if petLeprechaun then petLeprechaun:Destroy() end Leprechaun.Transparency = 0.0 if summonSound then summonSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

while script:FindFirstChild("Leprechaun") == nil do wait() end
local projectile = Instance.new("Part") projectile.FormFactor = 3 projectile.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) projectile.Name = "Projectile" projectile.CanCollide = false
local projectileMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") projectileMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=28937301" projectileMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=28937670" projectileMesh.Parent = projectile
local treasureChest = Instance.new("Part") treasureChest.FormFactor = 3 treasureChest.Size = Vector3.new(2, 1.2, 2) treasureChest.Name = "Treasure Chest" treasureChest.CanCollide = true
local chestMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") chestMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=23723701" chestMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=23723666" chestMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 0.75) chestMesh.Parent = treasureChest
local treasureAssets = {29100449, 24015579, 41457719, 59190534}
local petLeprechaun = script.Leprechaun
while petLeprechaun.Value == nil do wait() end
petLeprechaun = petLeprechaun.Value
while petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Target") == nil do wait() end
local target = petLeprechaun.Target
if target.Value == nil then --petLeprechaun:Remove() end
local damage = 5
-- Best part about doing this from the character local vCharacter = script.Parent local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.Died:connect(function() petLeprechaun:Destroy() end) end
local petLeprechaunHumanoid = petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local petLeprechaunTorso = petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local enemyHumanoid = target.Value
if petLeprechaunHumanoid then petLeprechaunHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 24.0
while petLeprechaunHumanoid.MaxHealth < 350 do petLeprechaunHumanoid.MaxHealth = 350 wait() end
while petLeprechaunHumanoid.Health < 350 do petLeprechaunHumanoid.Health = 350 wait() end end
local healCount = 0
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil and player ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function blow(hit) local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end
function shoot(target, direction, distance) if petLeprechaunTorso == nil or petLeprechaunHumanoid == nil then return end local projectileClone = projectile:Clone()
local speed = 50
local upVector = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) local dy = direction.Y direction = (direction * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1)) local dxz = direction.magnitude local xzVelocity = direction.unit * speed local yVelocity = ((speed * dy / dxz) + ((196.1 * dxz)/(2 * speed))) * upVector
print(dy, dxz)
local spawnPos = petLeprechaunTorso.Position
print(yVelocity)
yVelocity = yVelocity * 10.0
projectileClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + petLeprechaunTorso.CFrame.lookVector) projectileClone.Velocity = xzVelocity + yVelocity --projectileClone.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, projectileClone:GetMass() * 190, 0)
projectileClone.Parent = game.Workspace projectileClone.Touched:connect(blow) debris:AddItem(projectileClone, 4)
wait(0.5) projectileClone.CanCollide = true end
function slash(hit) end
local petLeprechaunLeftArm = petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") local petLeprechaunRightArm = petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") local petLeprechaunLeftLeg = petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") local petLeprechaunRightLeg = petLeprechaun:FindFirstChild("Right Leg")
if petLeprechaunLeftArm then petLeprechaunLeftArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petLeprechaunRightArm then petLeprechaunRightArm.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petLeprechaunRightLeg then petLeprechaunRightLeg.Touched:connect(slash) end
if petLeprechaunLeftLeg then petLeprechaunLeftLeg.Touched:connect(slash) end
petLeprechaunTorso.Touched:connect(slash)
local children = petLeprechaun:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i].ClassName == "Tool" then if children[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then children[i].Handle.Touched:connect(slash) end end end
local targetEnemy if enemyHumanoid then targetEnemy = enemyHumanoid.Parent end local targetEnemyTorso
if targetEnemy then targetEnemyTorso = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Torso") if targetEnemyTorso == nil then --petLeprechaun:Remove() end else --petLeprechaun:Remove() end
target.Changed:connect(function() if target.Value then enemyHumanoid = target.Value targetEnemy = enemyHumanoid.Parent if targetEnemy then targetEnemyTorso = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Torso") end end end)
local animating = false
local checkAOE = Vector3.new(15, 15, 15)
local treasure = treasureChest:Clone()
coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(4.0) while petLeprechaun and myTorso do if math.random() < 0.25 and treasure.Parent == nil then treasure = treasureChest:Clone() treasure.CFrame = myTorso.CFrame + Vector3.new(math.random(15, 25), 3, math.random(10, 35)) treasure.Transparency = 1.0 treasure.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(treasure, 15) print(treasure) end wait(6.0) end end))
while true do local ray = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(petLeprechaunTorso.Position, petLeprechaunTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0), nil) if ray and petLeprechaunHumanoid and ray.Parent ~= targetEnemy and ray.Parent ~= vCharacter and ray.Name ~= "Treasure Chest" and not animating then petLeprechaunHumanoid.Jump = true end if targetEnemyTorso then shoot(targetEnemyTorso.Position, (targetEnemyTorso.Position - petLeprechaunTorso.Position).unit, (targetEnemyTorso.Position - petLeprechaunTorso.Position).magnitude) targetEnemyTorso = nil wait(0.5) else if myTorso then petLeprechaunHumanoid:MoveTo(myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(4, 0, 4), myTorso) end end if treasure and treasure.Parent and treasure.Transparency == 1.0 then local distance = (treasure.Position - petLeprechaunTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 90 then petLeprechaunHumanoid:MoveTo(treasure.Position, treasure) if distance < 2 and not animating then local findSound = script:FindFirstChild("HereYaGo") if findSound then findSound:Play() end treasure.Transparency = 0.0 local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") sparkles.Parent = treasure debris:AddItem(sparkles, 1.0) animating = true local liftAnim = petLeprechaunHumanoid:LoadAnimation(script.LiftAnim) if liftAnim then liftAnim:Play() end wait(1.5) animating = false treasure.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") and hit.Parent == vCharacter and not animating then animating = true -- Do st00f here petLeprechaunHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 petLeprechaunTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(petLeprechaunTorso.Position, petLeprechaunTorso.Position + ((myTorso.Position - petLeprechaunTorso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) )) local bowAnim = petLeprechaunHumanoid:LoadAnimation(script.BowAnim) if bowAnim then bowAnim:Play() end if vPlayer then local backpack = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if backpack then local item = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(treasureAssets[math.random(1, #treasureAssets)]):GetChildren()[1] if item then item.Parent = backpack end end end local yaySound = script:FindFirstChild("Yay") if yaySound then yaySound:Play() end if treasure then treasure:Destroy() end wait(2.0) petLeprechaunHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 24.0 animating = false end end) end end end wait() end

local Tool = script.Parent local Lantern = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer
local sg local frame
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer then local playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui and playerGui:FindFirstChild("LanternGui") == nil then sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "LanternGui" sg.Parent = playerGui
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = sg frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 220, 0, 30) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -110, 1, -130) frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxRound
local genericTextLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel") genericTextLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 genericTextLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) genericTextLabel.Visible = true genericTextLabel.ZIndex = 10 genericTextLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size10 genericTextLabel.Font = Enum.Font.Legacy genericTextLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) genericTextLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Center genericTextLabel.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top genericTextLabel.Parent = frame genericTextLabel.Text = "Summon the Leprechaun!" end end end
function onUnequipped() if sg then sg:Remove() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
while true do if vCharacter and genericTextLabel then if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("MonkeyAIScript") then genericTextLabel.Text = "Command him onto your enemies!" else genericTextLabel.Text = "Summon the Monkey!" end end wait() end
